item.description: Paul has got his hands on some unlicensed fireworks.

item.description: After hitting an iceberg, the captain realises Titanic is going to sink.

item.description: Nick Knowles and the Gladiators build a vital youth club for Beverley's young people.

item.description: When a mission goes wrong, spy Ethan Hunt finds himself out on a limb and under suspicion.

item.description: Looking to leave a positive legacy, Michael Corleone instead faces violent rivalry.

item.description: Dame Dr Maggie Aderin-Pocock explores her favourite space rock, the moon.

item.description: Agnes and family fret about what Christmas presents to buy.
